bioconda.name: ltr_retriever
bioconda.summary: Sensitive and accurate identification of LTR retrotransposons

biotools.summary: LTR_retriever is a highly accurate and sensitive program for identification of LTR retrotransposons; The LTR Assembly Index (LAI) is also included in this package.

bioschemas.name: LTR_retriever
bioschemas.summary: LTR_retriever is a highly accurate and sensitive program for identification of LTR retrotransposons; The LTR Assembly Index (LAI) is also included in this package.
